desc: The platform is to be modelled using layered shell elements and the bracket using 3D elements.The method of fixation is not considered in this study but where the frame (vertical) edge meets the corner of the room, the connection should be approximated using a ‘Fixed Support’. You may also need to apply a ‘Frictionless Support’ to the faces of the L-frame bracket that are considered to be in contact with the walls of the room – this prevents occurrences of unwanted rotation of the assembly.The design should be as light as possible. It should have a minimum factor of safety of 1.5 on the yield stress for the bracket and of 2 for the 0o and 90o ultimate tensile strengths for the Fibre ReinforcedPolymer. There is no need to consider the factor of safety of the foam core. In addition, the maximum displacement under load should nowhere exceed 5 mm.The panel should sit on top of the L-frame and be fixed to it.
title: Design on ansys - open to bidding
